attributes.action: Insitute a regime of fines for misuse of the apostrophe!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national image is at stake if we can't even punctuate our own language properly! A fine for haphazard or repeated misuse of an apostrophe, e.g. for a simple plural, would soon raise more than enough revenue to replace the iniqitous inheritance tax, and do wonders for our self esteem as a country!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
